resources.string: Click to center map on your location
Touch map to access map interaction menu
Set current location in previously touched point
Select to add new obstacle. If you choose this menu item while moving, point will be snapped to current route
Click to start selected route.\n Panel with obstacles information will open.\n Panel shows next obstacle and distance to next turn.
Select the category that best describe you
App can download and update navigation maps from server. Choose your region to download content. Suitable map will be chosen from loaded maps automatically based on your location.
GeTS Server is used for uploading and sharing your obstacles. GeTS Server uses Google authentication with two options.
Click to sign in using web browser window.
Use your current android account to sign in to GeTS.
Points your create can be shared with other users if you have privileges. Click cloud icon to share corresponding category.
